Headline: 63rd bound -Green Line Service Delayed Oak Park
ShortDescription: 63rd bound -Green Line trains are standing near Oak Park due to police department investigation. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd bound -Green Line trains are standing near Oak Park due to police department investigation.
Personnel are working to restore service.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC Halsted due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC Halsted due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Belle Plaine/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Belle Plaine/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Belle Plaine/Milwaukee.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
